title: Team_MegaPari
author: Team_MegaPari
content: The World Cup is over but not our promotions! There are still sports worth your attention! Celebrate the Winter season with MegaPari - place bets on hockey and we refund you any lost bets with a 20% free bet. Place bets on hockey matches with a minimum of 10 EUR to qualify. Any losses during the period from December 20 to December 25, 2022 will be refunded through a promo code for a free bet.
